title: Lunar Revel skins for the next 8 years
body:
2020: Twitch, Year of the Rat

2021: Alistar, Year of the Ox

2022: Rengar, Year of the Tiger

2023: Kalista maybe? Year of the Rabbit

2024: Aurelion Sol, Year of the Dragon

2025: Cassiopeia, Year of the Snake

2026: Hecarim, Year of the Horse

2027: Ornn, Year of the Ram

After that, we'll have cycled back around to Monkey again in 2028

And for your listening pleasure, the 2019 Year of the Pig Login theme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVVK3taC0kw

(look at the little piggy shaking his butt! https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/293001441558265856.png?v=1 \)
